attributes.action: Set a Realistic Minimum Wage for HGV Drivers
attributes.additional_details: We are all being ripped of by these companies paying £10ph when they are lining there pockets with the money they save from cheap labour. We need the government to step up and support the men and women that have worked hard to ensure you and everyone else has food on the table or sofas to sit on and beds to sleep on so please I ask you for the support I know you can give us and push this forwar
attributes.background: HGV Driver. For the amount of time, effort and money we pay for our license to drive what is effectively a target for thieves whether it be the good in the trailer or the Diesel in the tank.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the minimum wage for HGV drivers, however it's not clear what you would like the minimum wage to be increased to.

You may like to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584881
